General.Name: He Bei Cheng De LoLo Co Ltd
General.Description: Cheng De Lolo Company Limited manufactures and sells plant protein beverages. It offers apricot almond milk, sugar free almond milk, intense almond milk, mini almond milk, walnut milk, and low sugar walnut milk under the Lulu brand name. The company was formerly known as He Bei Cheng De Lolo Company Limited and changed its name to Cheng De Lolo Company Limited in May 2022. Cheng De Lolo Company Limited was founded in 1950 and is based in Chengde, China.
General.Address: High-tech Industrial Development Zone, Chengde, China
